mapper.select: SELECT A.IMG_CODE , A.POST_CODE , A.REPORT_CODE , A.IMG_URL , A.ALT_TEXT FROM IMG A WHERE A.POST_CODE = #{postCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IMG A ( A.IMG_CODE , A.POST_CODE , A.REPORT_CODE , A.IMG_URL , A.ALT_TEXT ) VALUES ( 'I' || LPAD(SEQ_POST_CODE.NEXTVAL, 6, '0') , #{postCode} , null , #{imgUrl} , 'Empty IMG' )
